name: Super Metroid: Containment Chamber
overview: Super Metroid Containment Chamber Higly suggested to go through this hack even if you decide to look up every solutions. This can teach you many tricks and mechanic you might have not know. -This is a puzzle hack, You can not proceed without finishing the next puzzle,There is no hidden items and no hidden path. -All the mechanic used are native to the original engine. -If at any point you think you forgot something and need to go back you are misunderstanding the hack. -The hack is not meant to kill you, Recharge stations and saves are plenty full. -Even if you believe this hack is too technical for you, it is good to go through the hack, it will teach you new things about the Super Metroid engine. -If you get stuck and don't know what to do look at the readme/hint file. It contains hints and video links to the solutions.
